info.title: PATCH Vulnerability Management API
info.description: API for managing assets, vulnerabilities, and remediations in hospital environments

get.description: Get all assets. Any authenticated user can view all assets.

post.description: Create a new asset. The authenticated user will be recorded as the creator.

get.description: Get a single asset by ID. Any authenticated user can view any asset.

delete.description: Delete an asset. Only the user who created the asset can delete it.

put.description: Update an asset. Only the user who created the asset can update it.

get.description: Get all asset managers that have been set up. Any authenticated user can view all settings.

post.description: Create a new asset manager to sync from. The authenticated user will be recorded as the creator.

get.description: Get all vulnerabilities. Any authenticated user can view all vulnerabilities.

post.description: Create a new vulnerability. The authenticated user will be recorded as the creator.

get.description: Get a single vulnerability by ID. Any authenticated user can view any vulnerability.

delete.description: Delete a vulnerability. Only the user who created the vulnerability can delete it.

put.description: Update a vulnerability. Only the user who created the vulnerability can update it.

get.description: Get all remediations. Any authenticated user can view all remediations.

post.description: Create a new remediation. The authenticated user will be recorded as the creator.

get.description: Get a single remediation by ID. Any authenticated user can view any remediation.

delete.description: Delete a remediation. Only the user who created the remediation can delete it.

put.description: Update a remediation. Only the user who created the remediation can update it.

issues.description: An array of issues that were responsible for the error
